mapper.select: select from TB4D_DATASET_GROUP ORDER by DS_GROUP_ORDER_NUM ASC
select case when max(DS_GROUP_ORDER_NUM) is null then 1 else max(DS_GROUP_ORDER_NUM)+1 end ORDERNUM from TB4D_DATASET_GROUP

select * from TB4D_DATASET_GROUP where DS_GROUP_ORDER_NUM = (select max(DS_GROUP_ORDER_NUM) from TB4D_DATASET_GROUP where DS_GROUP_ORDER_NUM<(select DS_GROUP_ORDER_NUM from TB4D_DATASET_GROUP where DS_GROUP_ID=#{id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}) and DS_GROUP_PARENT_ID=#{parentId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}) and DS_GROUP_PARENT_ID=#{parentId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}

select * from TB4D_DATASET_GROUP where DS_GROUP_ORDER_NUM = (select min(DS_GROUP_ORDER_NUM) from TB4D_DATASET_GROUP where DS_GROUP_ORDER_NUM>(select DS_GROUP_ORDER_NUM from TB4D_DATASET_GROUP where DS_GROUP_ID=#{id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}) and DS_GROUP_PARENT_ID=#{parentId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}) and DS_GROUP_PARENT_ID=#{parentId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}
